title: Indiaâ€™s Air Pollution Season Is Off to a Terrible Start.
description: Toxic air in New Delhi and large parts of northern India this week has prompted school closures, traffic restrictions and political infighting.
dc:creator: Sameer Yasir and Mike Ives
media:description: As of Thursday afternoon, 18 cities across India had very poor air based on air quality readings many times above what the World Health Organization would consider healthy.
